name: Bolt Action
description: A small zombie shooter that requires both twitch and strategic skills, and a sense of humor...One genetically enhanced man along with an inept, insulting, and cowardly scientist must save the World from his evil twin brother and the mutated hordes!  Strategically use weapons including a heavy cannon, quad-barrel shotgun, nodachi samurai sword, and a Mantis™ caltrop along with the environment itself to defeat the tireless, invading monstrosities.
